import sys

read = sys.stdin.read
readline = sys.stdin.readline
readlines = sys.stdin.readlines
sys.setrecursionlimit(10 ** 9)
INF = 1 << 60
MOD = 1000000007


def main():
    N, i = list(map(int, readline().split()))

    print((N - i + 1))

    return


def __starting_point():
    main()

__starting_point()
